feedback.title: Feedback on the Structures and Functions Module unused

description.p: Please answer the questions below. Your response will not be graded, so this is optional, but the creators of this course would appreciate your feedback.

prompt.p: Evaluate the extent to which you feel you understand the following topics. In other words, how well do you understand each of the following topics?
The anatomy of the cardiovascular system
The function of the cardiovascular system
Could more images have aided in your understanding of these topics?
Could more audio recordings have aided in your understanding of these topics?
Could more video walkthroughs have aided in your understanding of these topics?
Could more interactive activities have aided in your understanding of these topics?
Could more explanatory text have aided in your understanding of these topics?
What concept(s) or topic(s) covered in this unit are still unclear to you, if any?
Do you have any questions about the material covered in this module? If so, please list them below.
